title: Companion Approval Guide
content: Druid Grove. Crush the Tadpole outside of the Druid Grove. Convince the Owlbear not to kill you in its cave. Tell Scratch (dog) that he can come to your Camp if his friend doesn't wake up. Help Auntie Ethel when she's confronted by Johl and Demir. Tell Mayrina that her brothers are dead "by your own hand". Insist on helping Mayrina when talking to Auntie Ethel at her house.
